original_text: It will be very bad for anyone who cheats other people so that he can make his family rich. He thinks that his riches will make him safe. He thinks that he is too high up for any trouble to reach him. It will be very bad for anyone who cheats other people so that he can make his family rich. He thinks that his riches will make him safe. He thinks that he is too high up for any trouble to reach him.
korean_text: 재앙을 피하기 위하여 높은 데 깃들이려 하며 자기 집을 위하여 부당한 이익을 취하는 자에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for anyone who cheats other people
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람을 속이는 사람에게는 큰 화가 미칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: so that he can make his family rich
He thinks that his riches will make him safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 재물이 자신을 안전하게 해줄 것이라고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: He thinks that he is too high up
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 너무 높은 곳에 있다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: for any trouble to reach him
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 어려움도 자신에게 닿지 못할 것이라고
